body.name: Good Molecules Glycolic Exfoliating Toner - Facial Toner and Exfoliant with Glycolic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe to Moisturize - Skincare for Face
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 7 mins
features: BRIGHTEN, RENEW, AND RESURFACE: Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Glycolic Exfoliating Toner made with powerful ingredients to reveal your most radiant skin! Tone, exfoliate and restore moisture with this super toner!

EXFOLIATE, MOISTURIZE, AND SOOTHE: Notice the difference in your skin! This gentle yet exfoliating toner targets texture, dullness, uneven skin tone, and dehydration with a formula designed to bring out the best in your skin, leaving you glowing and refreshed.

POTENT FORMULA FOR RADIANT SKIN: Glycolic acid penetrates deep into the skin for renewal and exfoliation, while the galactomyces ferment works to replenish moisture! Additionally, hyaluronic acid and aloe help to hydrate and soothe skin.

PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Dispense a few drops into your hands or a cotton pad. At night, apply to skin after cleansing and before serums and moisturizers. We recommend wearing SPF during the day when using this product.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for regular use; this serum is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 4.2, is fragrance-free, vegan, and never tested on animals.
body.description: Glycolic Exfoliating Toner by Good Molecules120ml/4ozReveal smoother, brighter skin with the help of this gentle resurfacing toner. Powered by glycolic acid and galactomyces ferment, Glycolic Exfoliating Toner helps to exfoliate the surface of the skin to promote a more even tone and texture. Glycolic Acid (3.5%); encourages exfoliation and renewal of the skin on a deeper level, revealing your radiant glow. Galactomyces ferment helps to replenish moisture and leave skin feeling supple and smooth.See A Difference In Your SkinIn addition to exfoliation, our toner also offers replenishing hydration with hyaluronic acid and aloe extract. Hyaluronic acid is a moisturizing ingredient that occurs naturally in the skin; it replenishes the top layers of the skin, encouraging it to look smoother and plumper. Aloe is nurturing, nutrient-rich, and soothing to the skin. Notice brighter, balanced, healthier-looking skin with this powerful toner!Easy Addition To Your Beauty RegimenApply to skin at night after cleansing and before serums and moisturizers by dispensing a few drops into your hands or a cotton pad. We recommend wearing SPF during the day when using this product. Though many find this formula gentle enough for daily use, we recommend using only 3-5x a week in the beginning, with the option to gradually increase to once daily at most. This product should not be used with other exfoliants or products containing retinol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sensitive skin girlie
reviews.reviewText: So this is my first time using a glycolic acid toner. I've used SA toners in the past but I've heard good things about this one. I do have sensitive skin so I just swiped it on my skin with a cotton swab left in on for a minute then I rinsed off my face with water then I followed up with moisturizer. I have really dry patchy skin and this morning all my dry patches were gone and I had no irritation at all. I'm sure after a while my skin will grow more tolerance to it. I did feel tingling sensation to this even though there are some calming ingredients in this toner so definitely use this carefully ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle exfoliating toner
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived quickly. I am always fearful of shipping liquids as I have had several products arrived spilled, but it was secured well and fully sealed. After 2 weeks of using product, I’m really liking it. I switched from a salicylic acid toner to this and it’s proven to be much less harsh and drying on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LUV this toner! I just order 2 more bottles but it's taking forever to reach, I hope this will change soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but wears off fast
reviews.reviewText: I use this as a deodorant and I had tried a different brand before, the one I used before lasted for about 24 hours without having to reapply again. In this case, I use it but sometimes have to reapply it after 8 hours, if you’re using it for something else, buy it because it’s not sticky and has a great smell. But if you’ll use it as a deodorant you might want to try something else before this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More of toner and exfoliant.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product as a toner and exfoliant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I saw that this works as a deodorant and let me tell you. I’ve tried everything, Lumu as well as other body deodorants and this has 100% stopped any body odor. I’m a PACU nurse and am very active at work. I sweat throughout my work day & while I still sweat there’s no odor to it. I even workout after work and still don’t smell even a hint of odor.

Por el empaque no se si es un producto original ya que se veía muy barato , pero puede que sea asi para no aumentar mucho el precio del producto . Huele como agua oxigenada y al menos en mi piel , arde , si tienes una herida pequeñita o un granito abierto ARDE. Aun asi lo use por dos semanas y no mejoro en nada mis manchitas en la piel , me atrevo a decir que incluso empeoro la textura de mi piel. Lo estoy usando en rodillas y codos solo para darle un uso y que se gaste , pero lo mismo , no veo mejoras.
